name	lower_frequency	upper_frequency
Microwaves	1000000000	110000000000
Infrared radiation	300000000000	400000000000
Visible radiation (light)	405000000000000	790000000000000
Ultraviolet light	1000000000000000	100000000000000000
X-rays	30000000000000000	60000000000000000000
Gamma rays	60000000000000000000
